nl.esciencecenter.esight.datastructures

Class IntPBO

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.datastructures.IntPBO

  • public class IntPBO
extends java.lang.Object
    PixelBuffer object used for copying the frambuffer to a file (screenshots).
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IntPBO(int width, int height)
      Basic constructor for IntPBO.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyToPBO(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)

      OpenGL internal deletion method for this PBO.

      OpenGL initialization method, sets up storage.
      void makeScreenshotPNG(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl, java.lang.String filename)
      Convenience method that makes the neccesary calls to the OpenGL instance in succession to copy the PBO to a buffer and then write it to disk using the BufferedImage construct.

      • IntPBO

        public IntPBO(int width,
      int height)
        Basic constructor for IntPBO.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the canvas to take a screenshot of.
        height - The height of the canvas to take a screenshot of.

      • copyToPBO

        public void copyToPBO(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
               throws UninitializedException
        Makes the calls to the OpenGL instance necessary to copy the current framebuffer to the data storage.
        Parameters:
        gl - The opengl instance.
        Throws:
        UninitializedException - if the PBO was not initialized before use.

      • getBuffer

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer getBuffer()
        Getter for the data storage.
        Returns:
        The data store containing a picture.

        public java.nio.IntBuffer getPointer()
        Getter for the pointer to this PBO.
        Returns:
        The OpenGL internal pointer to this PBO.

      • makeScreenshotPNG

        public void makeScreenshotPNG(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
                     java.lang.String filename)
        Convenience method that makes the neccesary calls to the OpenGL instance in succession to copy the PBO to a buffer and then write it to disk using the BufferedImage construct.
        Parameters:
        gl - The OpenGL instance
        filename - The filename to use forwriting this picture.
